text:
คำศัพท์ควรใช้ใน IELTS writing
สำหรับเริ่มบทความ เริ่มด้วยอันนี้เลยค่ะ
เริ่มด้วย +
ต่อด้วยรูปแบบกราฟ +
คำกริยา +
คำอธิบาย
The/ the given / the supplied / the presented / the shown / the provided
diagram / table / figure / illustration / graph / chart / flow chart / picture/ presentation/ pie chart / bar graph/ column graph / line graph / table data/ data / information / pictorial/ process diagram/ map/ pie chart and table/ bar graph and pie chart ...
shows / represents / depicts / enumerates / illustrates / presents/ gives / provides / delineates/ outlines/ describes / delineates/ expresses/ denotes/ compares/ shows contrast / indicates / figures / gives data on / gives information on/ presents
trans:
Recommended vocabulary for IELTS writing.
To start writing an article, you should start with this.
Start with +
Continue with the chart pattern +
Verb +
An explanation
The/ the given / the supplied / the presented / the shown / the provided
diagram / table / figure / illustration / graph / chart / flow chart / picture/ presentation/ pie chart / bar graph/ column graph / line graph / table data/ data / information / pictorial/ process diagram/ map/ pie chart and table/ bar graph and pie chart ...
shows / represents / depicts / enumerates / illustrates / presents/ gives / provides / delineates/ outlines/ describes / delineates/ expresses/ denotes/ compares/ shows contrast / indicates / figures / gives data on / gives information on/ presents
